titleStmt.title: A relation of the execution of Iames Graham late Marquesse of Montrosse, at Edenburgh, on Tuesday the 21 of May instant. With his last speech, carriage, and most remarkable passages upon the scaffold. Also, a letter out of Ireland, more fully concerning the taking of Clonmell.
titleStmt.author: H. P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Griffin in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
